episodes.title: Malindi cult fears grow as 48 reported Missing, secret burials suspected
episodes.description: Fears that six children from one family are among dozens who have died in what appears to be a fresh wave of the shakahola massacre. A close relative, who spoke to the children’s parents and the leaders suspected to be behind this second round of killings says the parents themselves confirmed the deaths. Human rights activists now claim more than forty people could have been killed and secretly buried in kwa Binzaro since March.

episodes.title: Another cult in Shakahola?
episodes.description: TONIGHT, DISTURBING DEVELOPMENTS OUT OF KILIFI COUNTY ARE REIGNITING FEARS THAT THE HORROR OF THE SHAKAHOLA TRAGEDY MAY NOT BE OVER. ALMOST TWO YEARS SINCE THE HORRIFYING DISCOVERY OF MASS GRAVES IN SHAKAHOLA FOREST,THERE ARE RENEWED CASES OF CULT-PRACTICES  AFTER  AUTHORITIES  RECOVERED ONE BODY AND RESCUED FOUR EMACIATED INDIVIDUALS , JUST KILOMETERS FROM THE ORIGINAL SHAKAHOLA SITE. EVEN MORE UNSETTLING, AMONG THOSE ARRESTED ARE A HUSBAND AND WIFE WHO ARE FORMER VICTIMS OF THE SHAKAHOLA CULT, WHO VANISHED FROM THEIR HOME IN SIAYA COUNTY AND RETURNED TO THE FOREST

episodes.title: Rongo church closed
episodes.description:
There was Drama at the Rongo Police Station in Migori county after 57 faithful of Melkio St. Joseph Missions of Messaiha Africa Church refused to go home, insisting that they could only return to their church, where two members reportedly perished after refusing to seek medical attention. Migori County Commissioner Mutua Kiilu revealed that there were registration anomalies while setting up the facility, which remains cordoned off by police officers undertaking investigations amid reports of Cult-LIKE activities associated with the Church.
#CitizenTV #citizendigital
subjects: Melkio St Joseph Missions of Messiah Africa Church

episodes.title: "Cult" in Migori
episodes.description: Police in Migori County have recovered two bodies at St. Joseph Mission of Africa, church is located at Kochola village in Rongo sub-county. 57 other people believed to be faithful to the church were rescued by the police in what is suspected to be indoctrination-driven habits. Police say the congregants are defiant about undergoing medical checks as they chanted and sang religious songs.
subjects: Melkio St Joseph Missions of Messiah Africa Church

episodes.title: How controversial pastor Paul Mackenzie acquired the Shakahola cult farm using elders
episodes.description:
Tonight, we unravel how controversial pastor Paul Mackenzie acquired the Shakahola cult farm using elders from the 5 clan groups that claim ownership of more than 100,000 acres of the Chakama ranch in Kilifi County. Emmanuel Mwaro one of the signatories to an agreement says Mackenzie doesn’t own the land but only paid 500,000 shillings for a one-year stay commonly known as Kajama. 
In an exclusive agreement in our possession Mackenzie initially wanted to settle in and use 800 acres before changing his mind and opting for a 500-acre piece of land. And as Francis Mtalaki reports top security officers were aware of the transactions and at some point accompanied Mackenzie for his mission in the forest.
